com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Interface BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BleNode.ConnectionFailListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BleDevice.DefaultConnectionFailListener
    Enclosing class:
    BleDevice

    public static interface BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener
extends BleNode.ConnectionFailListener
    Provide an implementation of this callback to BleDevice.setListener_ConnectionFail(ConnectionFailListener).
    See Also:
    BleDevice.DefaultConnectionFailListener, BleDevice.setListener_ConnectionFail(ConnectionFailListener)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
      Structure passed to onEvent(ConnectionFailEvent) to provide more info about how/why the connection failed.
      static class  BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status
      The reason for the connection failure.
      static class  BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Timing
      For BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.NATIVE_CONNECTION_FAILED, BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.DISCOVERING_SERVICES_FAILED, and BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.BONDING_FAILED, gives further timing information on when the failure took place.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode.ConnectionFailListener

        BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.AutoConnectUsage, BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please onEvent(BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent e)
      Return value is ignored if device is either BleDeviceState.RECONNECTING_LONG_TERM or reason BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.allowsRetry() is false.

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.Please onEvent(BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent e)
        Return value is ignored if device is either BleDeviceState.RECONNECTING_LONG_TERM or reason BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.allowsRetry() is false. If the device is BleDeviceState.RECONNECTING_LONG_TERM then authority is deferred to BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.

        Otherwise, this method offers a more convenient way of retrying a connection, as opposed to manually doing it yourself. It also lets the library handle things in a slightly more optimized/cleaner fashion and so is recommended for that reason also.

        NOTE that this callback gets fired *after* BleDevice.StateListener lets you know that the device is BleDeviceState.DISCONNECTED.

        The time parameters like BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent.attemptTime_latest() are of optional use to you to decide if connecting again is worth it. For example if you've been trying to connect for 10 seconds already, chances are that another connection attempt probably won't work.
